cssOverride.jcr:title: CSS Override
cssOverride.fieldDescription: Properties defined in CSS will override their values defined via the above controls.
cssOverride.name: cssOverride

before.jcr:title: Before Pseudo Element
before.fieldDescription: Properties defined in CSS will be applied to the ::before Pseudo element.
before.name: beforePseudoElement

after.jcr:title: After Pseudo Element
after.fieldDescription: Properties defined in CSS will be applied to the ::after Pseudo element.
after.name: afterPseudoElement
